aws_access_key_id.description: AWS Access key that grants access to s3 and Amazon Transcribe.

aws_secret_access_key.description: AWS Secret Access key that grans access to s3 and Amazon Transcribe.

aws_s3_bucket_name.description: S3 bucket where the audio file and transcript will be stored.

assembly_ai_api_token.description: API Token to access Assembly AI's API.

language_code.description: Language identifier of the dominant language spoken in the audio.

max_retries.description: The number of times to poll AWS Transcribe for results.

retry_timeout.description: The polling period in seconds between subsequent check to AWS Transcribe for results.
